articles.title: Apple's new Mac Mini is killing my Hackintosh - CNET
articles.description: Commentary: Four years ago, I built a PC, then tricked it to run Mac software. Soon, Apple will stop it from working.
articles.content:
Apple's M1 chip is being hailed as a leap forward for Macs. But it's death to my Hackintosh.
Apple
One of my favorite nerdy hobbies is ending, whether I want it to or not. And it's Apple's fault.
